title: 229: "The Dashing Sea Train and the City of Water: Water Seven!"
author: neverwatchedonepiece
description: Detailed blog post reviewing One Piece episode 229, praising Oda's world-building ability with Water 7's Venice-inspired architecture and the introduction of the sea train system. The reviewer expresses enthusiasm for the arc's potential and discusses concerns about the Going Merry's condition.

title: When Does One Piece Animation Get Good? Answered
author: Twinfinite
description: Article discussing the improvement of One Piece animation quality, noting that the Water 7 Arc starting at episode 229 is where viewers will start to notice significantly more quality in the animation.
